title: Perfectly Boiled Eggs
details: Add a pinch of salt to the water when boiling eggs. It helps make the eggs easier to peel.

title: Flavorful Marinades
details: Marinate meats in the refrigerator for better flavor absorption. For even distribution, place the meat and marinade in a sealed plastic bag.

title: Fluffy Rice Trick
details: Add a teaspoon of lemon juice to the water when cooking rice for a fluffier texture.

title: Measuring Sticky Ingredients
details: To measure sticky ingredients like honey, coat the measuring spoon with a thin layer of oil first.

title: Easy Citrus Zesting
details: Use a microplane grater for easy citrus zesting. It captures the flavorful outer peel without the bitter pith.

title: Preventing Pasta Sticking
details: Stir a bit of olive oil into cooked pasta to prevent it from sticking together.
